featured.text: “A lot of young people don’t want to dress up for work,” says the owner of a software company, “so it’s hard to hire people if you have a conservative dress code.”

other.text: If the number 16 is in the same area as the number making the call, an area code usually doesn’t need to be dialed.

definition.zh_def: 一組指令或語言，用於告訴計算機如何執行特定任務。
definition.en_def: A set of instructions or a language used to tell a computer how to perform specific tasks.
definition.example: She learned to code in Python to create her own applications.
